bayes.builders.scoring

Class BIC

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes.builders.scoring.BIC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoringFunction

    public class BIC
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoringFunction
    Scores a Bayesian network against a dataset using Bayesian Information Criterion (BIC).
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

      • calculateLogLikelihood

        public java.lang.Double calculateLogLikelihood(BayesianNetwork net,
                                      DataSet data)
        For each instance in the data, calculate the log-probability of the bayes net producing this data. Sum the resulting log-probability of each instance to get the total log-likelihood of the network generating the data. Tha
        Parameters:
        net - the Bayes net used to calcuate the likelihood of the data
        data - the data for which we want to know the likelihood
        Returns:
        the log-likelihood of seeing the data given the net

      • createQueries

        public java.util.ArrayList<BNConditionalQuery> createQueries(Instance instance,
                                                    BayesianNetwork net,
                                                    DataSet data)
        For each instance we need to create a conditional probability query on the value of each instance's attributes given the values of the rest of the attributes.
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance under examination
        net - the Bayes net
        data - the data set
        Returns:
        a query for each attribute in the instance
